vote.title: Authorize an increase in the purchase amount from Angel Espinosa and Linda Rodriguez of approximately 4,140 square feet of land improved with a single family dwelling located near the intersection of Dolphin Road and Detonte Street for the Dolphin Road from Spring Avenue to North Haskell Avenue Project - Not to exceed $19,000.00, increased from $115,500.00 ($111,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,500.00) to $134,500.00 ($130,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,500.00) - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($3,800.00) and Capital Projects Reimbursement Fund ($15,200.00)
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the purchase amount from Angel Espinosa and Linda Rodriguez of approximately 4,140 square feet of land improved with a single family dwelling located near the intersection of Dolphin Road and Detonte Street for the Dolphin Road from Spring Avenue to North Haskell Avenue Project - Not to exceed $19,000.00, increased from $115,500.00 ($111,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,500.00) to $134,500.00 ($130,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,500.00) - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($3,800.00) and Capital Projects Reimbursement Fund ($15,200.00)
